content.summary: A scalable social platform with real-time feeds, multimedia sharing, and messaging using React, Node.js, GraphQL, and PostgreSQL.
content.description: This platform connects users via dynamic feeds, image/video sharing, and messaging. It leverages Redis for caching and WebSockets for instant notifications. Features include hashtags, trending topics, and moderation tools, ensuring a safe, responsive community experience.

user_stories.title: User Registration & Auth
user_stories.story: As a new user, I want to sign up using email and password so that I can create a profile and access the platform.
user_stories.description: Implement JWT-based auth via GraphQL mutations. Store hashed passwords in Postgres.
acceptance_criteria: User can sign up with valid email/password

user_stories.title: Create Multimedia Post
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to create posts with text, images, or videos so that I can share content with my followers.
user_stories.description: React dropzone for uploads. Backend handles S3 upload and stores metadata in Postgres.
acceptance_criteria: Post appears in user profile immediately

user_stories.title: Real-time Feed Algorithm
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to see a feed of posts from people I follow so that I stay updated with their activities.
user_stories.description: GraphQL subscription or polling for new posts. Redis for caching feed data.
acceptance_criteria: Feed displays posts from followed users
New posts appear in real-time via WebSockets

user_stories.title: Follow/Unfollow System
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to follow or unfollow other users so that I can curate the content in my feed.
user_stories.description: Relational mapping in Postgres (follower_id, following_id). Update Redis counters.

user_stories.title: Direct Messaging
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to send private messages to other users so that I can communicate privately.
user_stories.description: Real-time chat using WebSockets (Socket.io). Store history in Postgres.

user_stories.title: Content Moderation
user_stories.story: As an admin, I want to view reported posts so that I can remove content that violates community guidelines.
user_stories.description: Admin dashboard to view flagged content. Soft delete capability.

acceptance_criteria.criteria: System must handle 10,000 concurrent users without degradation.
acceptance_criteria.title: Scalability Target

acceptance_criteria.criteria: API response time must be under 200ms for 95% of requests.
acceptance_criteria.title: API Latency

acceptance_criteria.criteria: All user data must be encrypted at rest and in transit.
acceptance_criteria.title: Data Security

acceptance_criteria.criteria: UI must be fully responsive on mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria.description: CSS media queries and mobile-first design.
acceptance_criteria.title: Mobile Responsiveness

assumptions: AWS S3 will be used for media storage.
GDPR compliance is required from day one.
out_of_scope: Native iOS and Android mobile applications.

gaps.impact: Lower engagement compared to AI feeds
